game.title: Serfs Galore
game.description: Serfs Galore is an action RTS in which the main player will spend coins to recruit soldiers and command them to beat enemies and grab keys to open doors.
game.history: Serfs Galore is the game submitted by Croxel Studios for the MizJam1.

features.feature: Complex map full of backtracking and puzzling layouts.
Lots of different soldiers with different strenght values.
Three different kinds of enemies who will try to destroy you.
Original fun and bouncy artstyle using billboarding and a round world shader.
A soundtrack that intensifies as the player progresses.
